verbs.description: [ARG0: West Virginia GOP Senate candidate Don Blankenship] [ARGM-TMP: on Monday] [V: reacted] [ARGM-MNR: defiantly] [ARGM-TMP: after President Donald Trump endorsed his primary opponent , West Virginia Attorney General Patrick Morrisey] .

West Virginia GOP Senate candidate Don Blankenship on Monday reacted defiantly after [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: endorsed] [ARG1: his primary opponent , West Virginia Attorney General Patrick Morrisey] .
